function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to damp, mould, cold, polluted, over-crowded, noisy dwellings","Impact":"Respiratory illnesses, infections, and other health issues","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation, addressing structural issues, and implementing environmental controls","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, and environmental monitoring devices","People":"Residents and occupants of housing","Owner":"Government authorities, building owners, and landlords"},{"Description":"Coercive control, physical, psychological or sexual violence by an intimate partner or family member","Impact":"Physical and mental trauma, long-term health effects, and social isolation","Mitigation":"Support services, legal protections, and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Safety alarms, communication devices, and surveillance systems","People":"Victims of domestic violence","Owner":"Government agencies, law enforcement, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Fire safety and carbon monoxide risk","Impact":"Risk of injury, death, and property damage","Mitigation":"Smoke detectors, fire extinguishers, and carbon monoxide alarms","Technologies":"Fire suppression systems, emergency escape plans, and building code compliance","People":"Residents and occupants of housing","Owner":"Building owners, property managers, and regulatory authorities"}]}
